search_results.full_title: Please Be Mine by Molly Burch
search_results.title: Please Be Mine
search_results.lyrics:
Please Be Mine Lyrics[Verse 1]
I told you once, I'll tell you again
You really are my very best friend
But I, but I had to go, to go
Every time I think of you now
I get so blue somehow
'Cause I, 'cause I still love you, love you

[Chorus]
Please be mine
Please be mine
Please be mine
Please be mine
[Verse 2]
I can feel the days grow cold
Boy, I'd love a hand to hold
Is yours, is yours still for me, for me?
I know I don't deserve you back
But I'd really like it like that
Would you, would you like it too, it too?

[Chorus]
Please be mine
Please be mine
Please be mine
Please be mineYou might also like3Embed

description.plain:
“Please Be Mine” is the debut record of Austin-based singer Molly Burch. Burch told The Line of Best Fit that this song was about her partner and guitarist Dailey Toliver.

We’d broken up and gotten back together and by the time we’d got back together that whole album was written. It wasn’t easy at first, it wasn’t about the context of the songs, it was more that we had to figure out how to be a creative partnership in addition to a romantic one. We moved past the heartache that we both had and now it feels extremely natural.”

body.plain:
“Please Be Mine” is the debut record of Austin-based singer Molly Burch. Burch told The Line of Best Fit that this song was about her partner and guitarist Dailey Toliver.

We’d broken up and gotten back together and by the time we’d got back together that whole album was written. It wasn’t easy at first, it wasn’t about the context of the songs, it was more that we had to figure out how to be a creative partnership in addition to a romantic one. We moved past the heartache that we both had and now it feels extremely natural.”

annotations:
I told you once, I’ll tell you again
 You really are my very best friend
 But I, but I had to go, to go
 Every time I think of you now
 I get so blue somehow
 ’Cause I, ’cause I still love you, love you

In 2013, Molly moved from Asheville, NC to Austin, TX in order to start her life anew. During this process, she had to leave everyone in her life behind, causing her great pain and sadness. She details these feelings in an interview with Austin Chronicle:

I remember seeing people and being like, ‘Oh my god, that group of friends – I’ll never have that!’ I was so certain. It’s hard to think back to that time. It was such a lonely time, and I didn’t have a natural way of meeting anybody, so it was a really tough transition. But I grew a lot, and gained a lot of independence by doing it.

Every time she remembers her past friendships and relationships, she gets “blue” and consumed by the sadness. She hasn’t forgotten her past, and still holds affection for those she loved, but has to keep moving on in her life.

I didn't know I could hold you
I coulda warned you

Back in the summer
While in the water
You touched my hair
You said you liked it
I know you liked it, I know it well

And in the cool bar
While we were dancing, you grabbed my waist
I know you liked it
You said you liked it
I know it well
I know you well

[Verse 5]
Here we go
Here it is, ah-ah-ah
Take a good hard look at it, ah-ah-ah
Oh, to be a part of it, ah-ah-ah
One day, you will see, my love
You belong to me

search_results.title: Only One
search_results.lyrics:
Only One Lyrics[Verse 1]
You left your mess on the floor
I know you know that's happened before
May I remind you, I'm the one
Who picks up the pieces when you're done

[Chorus]
Is that why you went away
Before I, before I could say
"Why'd you stop lovin' me?"
"Why'd you stop lovin' me?"
[Verse 2]
I heard you found someone new
Is she nice to talk to?
Or does she try to fight you
Just like I used to do?

[Chorus]
Is that why (Why), you went away
Before I (I), before I could say
"Why'd you stop lovin' me?" (Ah)
"Why'd you stop lovin' me?" (Ah)

[Bridge]
You said I was the only one
You said I was the only one
You said I was the only one

[Verse 3]
The one who runs
The chosen one, the holy one
Your only one
The one you love
The one you loveYou might also likeEmbed

description.plain:
“Only One” is the first (of 2 songs) of Molly Burch’s new EP that she will be releasing on August 2nd 2019.

Here is what Molly had to say about the EP:
“‘Only One’ was recorded at the same time as First Flower, but it didn’t quite make sense on the album. Both this and the B-side ‘Your Party’ fit together in a nice way, I think. I decided to call the 7” Ballads as an homage to the powerful female vocalists I idolized growing up. Seems sort of classic. Both songs really embody what I love to do – sing with emotion, and drama, and romance, taking as much time as I need.”

body.plain:
“Only One” is the first (of 2 songs) of Molly Burch’s new EP that she will be releasing on August 2nd 2019.

Here is what Molly had to say about the EP:
“‘Only One’ was recorded at the same time as First Flower, but it didn’t quite make sense on the album. Both this and the B-side ‘Your Party’ fit together in a nice way, I think. I decided to call the 7” Ballads as an homage to the powerful female vocalists I idolized growing up. Seems sort of classic. Both songs really embody what I love to do – sing with emotion, and drama, and romance, taking as much time as I need.”

search_results.title: Heart of Gold
search_results.lyrics:
Heart of Gold Lyrics[Verse 1]
Lately I've been desperately wondering
What you're doing, what you've been up to
What your world looks like around you
What you've lost and who has found you
Barely breathing, hardly been sleeping
I don't know what pills can treat this
Loving you has cost me forever
Don't you wish we were together?

[Chorus]
I don't know what you've been told
I have a heart of gold
Waiting for some kind of sign
I'm running out of time
All I ever wanted was your love
I treat it like my job
Tell me can we make it right
I'm running out of time
[Verse 2]
Secrets under all my intentions
I know it's bad but I never learned my lesson
I give you advice for love, but I hate it
Never wanna know what comes of it
And what will happen in the future?
Will I be the winner or the loser?
What if it goes right all of a sudden?
Maybe I'll be yours, we'll be loving

[Chorus]
I don't know what you've been told
I have a heart of gold
Waiting for some kind of sign
I'm running out of time
All I ever wanted was your love
I treat it like my job
Tell me can we make it right
I'm running out of timeYou might also like1Embed

If you take too long to hit me back
I can't promise you how I'll react
But all I can say is at least I'll wait for you
Lately I've been on a rollercoaster
Tryna get ahold of my emotions
But all that I know is I need you close

[Pre-Chorus]

Passionate, but I don't give no fuck
I'll admit that I'm a lil' messed up
But I can hide it when I'm all dressed up
I'm obsessive and I love too hard
Good at overthinkin' with my heart
How you even think I got this far, this far?
[Chorus]
I can be needy, way too damn needy
I can be needy, tell me how good it feels to be needed
I can be needy, so hard to please me
Tell me how good it feels to be

[Verse 2]
Sorry if I'm up and down a lot
Sorry if I think I'm not enough
And sorry if I say sorry way too much
You can go ahead and call me selfish
But after all this damage, I can't help it
But what you can trust is I need your touch

[Pre-Chorus]
I'ma scream and shout for what I love
Passionate, but I don't give no fuck
I'll admit that I'm a lil' messed up
But I can hide it when I'm all dressed up
I'm obsessive and I love too hard
Good at overthinkin' with my heart
How you even think I got this far, this far?

[Chorus]
I can be needy, way too damn needy
I can be needy, tell me how good it feels to be needed
I can be needy, so hard to please me
Tell me how good it feels to be needed
You might also like[Outro]
Ha, ha-ha, ha-ha
Ha-ha, ha-ha-ah
Ha-ha, ha-ah-ah-ahEmbed

search_results.full_title: I Love You Still by Molly Burch
search_results.title: I Love You Still
search_results.lyrics:
I Love You Still Lyrics[Verse 1]
It felt like such a dream when
It was easy to believe then
That everything was good and fine
I was yours, and you were mine

[Chorus 1]
I loved you then, and I love you now
I love you still, but I don't know how
To love you well, please teach me good
I'll be your pet, I always knew I would
[Verse 2]
Could it have been that we were too young?
Could it have been I was staring at the sun?
Could it have been that we never parted?
Well I'm sorry that I made you broken-hearted

[Chorus 2]
I loved you then, and I love you still
I love you now, and I always will
I have your heart, I'll be kind to it now
We'll see the light, I know we will somehowYou might also likeEmbed

search_results.title: Downhearted
search_results.lyrics:
Downhearted Lyrics[Verse 1]
You seem awfully quiet
I can see it in your eyes
You're wanting to be somewhere
Where you'll feel more alive
They say the heart grows fonder
With every step you take
But as you move away from me
I feel my body break

[Verse 2]
Where are you goin'?
Where have you been today?
Will you be back tomorrow?
Will you be back to me someday?
I could be your dream girl
Your whole world
If you let me
[Chorus]
You, you got me (Got me)
So downhearted (Downhearted)
You, you got me (Got me)
So downhearted (Downhearted)

[Verse 3]
I remembered recently
That I've lost a few of my things
My mind, my heart, my good intentions
And most everything
I know there is much more to me than thinking about you
I've got a lot, a lot to give, I know that this is true

[Verse 4]
I've got the moon, the sun, the stars, the night
The sky, the trees, the dark, the light
I've got my arms, my legs, my hands, my touch
My eyes, my lips, I guess I don't need too much

[Chorus]
You, you got me (Got me)
So downhearted (Downhearted)
You, you got me (Got me)
So downhearted (Downhearted)You might also like2Embed
